title: is something wrong with the queues? 10 min queues for days while duo
body:
my friend and I are playing unranked draft matches and our queue times are averaging 5-10 mins.
Even when we switched to ARAM and blind picks the queues were horrible.
When I play alone I normally find a match in less than a minute, or 2-3 when I'm playing in the early AM.
Does the fact I am level 74 and he is only lvl 14 have something to do with it? Thanks for the help.

replies.body: As Jacko mentioned, in a match where there's a player significantly under level 30 and another player above level 30, matchmaking may have to work a bit harder to find players that would result in a statistically balanced match.

Yes, the fact that he is level 14 is the reason why the queues are massive. Once he hits 30s, it will be quicker. But, LoL is trying to find other newer players that are duo'd with more tactical players.

we also tried ARURF late last night but only got one game in due to the same issue.
(been in a normal draft queue together for 15 mins atm)
